name: Unintended Consequences of Butter Chicken
description:
In this game (if you wanna call it that lol), you play as a

guy on a date with a girl who is telling you alot of 

information. You must answer questions about her story

while simultaniously pressing buttons when they are

Prompted on the left side of the screen. You must

get the button presses correct, or you won't be able to

hold your bowels from all the buttered chicken you

ate. If you miss too many questions from your date,

you also lose the game and your date leaves you.

Good luck!
